welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orotina, Costa Rica! Known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality, we invite you to discover the charm of our city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights within Costa Rica and to neighboring countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights at Tobias Bolaños International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.
